item.title: The auto insurers of the future
item.description: By: Armin Monajemi Safer Drives, More Reliable Vehicles, Yet Higher Insurance Rates? Here is why? Day after day I hear from my Electric Vehicle owner friends that after the initial costs of acquisition, insurance is the costliest part of EV ownership.
